Articles.Content: cool plane. The b9 update looks really cool. Now bomb the base with bombs and not explosive footballs or you could just "deliver" a "party-cracker" to the "friendly" Island Base. Spies are everywhere you know... so I should really keep my mouth shut.

cool plane. The b9 update looks really cool. Now bomb the base with bombs and not explosive footballs or you could just "deliver" a "party-cracker" to the "friendly" Island Base. Spies are everywhere you know... so I should really keep my mouth shut.

Actually, some of the soccerballs survived, they other base said they wanted to see what this "offical mod" was all about. They ended up playing a game of soccer across the whole island.
